headline: Coca-Cola Cuts Minute Maid Concentrates To Refocus On Ready-To-Drink Juices
summary: Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) plans to discontinue Minute Maid frozen juice concentrates in the U.S. and Canada. The exit affects a product line that has been on shelves for nearly 80 years. The company cites a shift toward ready to drink and refrigerated juices as the key driver of the decision. For you as an investor, this move fits into Coca-Cola's broader push to focus on categories where consumer demand is strongest, particularly ready to drink beverages that match current preferences for...
